properties.description:
Run trusted for "Educação SESI" from raw tables of scae

No parameters is required. This table does not implement version control, only updates the records with the most recent value. 

Paths are:

tables =  {"path_origin_1": "/raw/bdo/scae/ciclo_matricula",
           "path_origin_2": "/raw/bdo/scae/ciclo",
           "path_origin_3": "/raw/bdo/scae/turma",
           "path_origin_4": "/raw/bdo/scae/oferta_curso",
           "path_origin_5": "/raw/bdo/scae/curso",
           "path_origin_6": "/raw/bdo/scae/produto_servico",
           "path_origin_7": "/raw/bdo/scae/vw_matricula",
           "path_destination": "/trs/evt/matricula_educacao_sesi_carga_horaria"
          }

activities.name: trusted__0__switch_env
activities.description: Calls trusted template that switches env.

adf.value: @json(concat('{"adf_factory_name": "', pipeline().DataFactory, '", "adf_pipeline_name": "', pipeline().Pipeline, '", "adf_pipeline_run_id": "', pipeline().RunId, '",  "adf_trigger_id": "', pipeline().TriggerId, '", "adf_trigger_name": "', pipeline().TriggerName, '", "adf_trigger_time": "', pipeline().TriggerTime, '",  "adf_trigger_type": "', pipeline().TriggerType, '"}'))
